faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.a1: Each credit lets you get 1 verified lead. The cost varies based on the quality level chosen: Basic (1 credit), Standard (2 credits), Premium (4 credits).
faq.a2: No, credits never expire. You can use them whenever you want.
faq.a3: If you're not satisfied, contact us within 14 days of purchase for a full refund of unused credits.
faq.a4: Yes, we issue invoices for all purchases. Enter your company details during checkout.
